## Summary

- What does this PR change?

## How to test

- [ ] `npm ci`
- [ ] `npm run typecheck`
- [ ] `npm run build:web`

(We deliberately do **not** require Playwright/browser automation in CI.)

## Checklist (required)

- [ ] Branch created from latest `main`
- [ ] PR only contains changes related to the goal (no unrelated refactors)
- [ ] CI is green (typecheck + web export smoke)
- [ ] If DB schema changed: migration path documented
- [ ] If behavior changed: docs/TODO updated or an issue created
